event_title: The Life of a Blue Whale

interactivity.requirements: Wednesday You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Lifting the Curse "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Talk to Tsuneyo in the dorm hallway

progression.synopsis: Sensei finds Tsuneyo standing in the hallway, contemplating the life of whales. He asks if she has any more substantial plans, and suggests that they hang out. Tsuneyo introduces him to Noodles (whom he already knows), and Sensei is alarmed to find that she has given Noodles a knife. He decides to leave because he's "starting to think the bird is talking", and Tsuneyo tells him that she taught Noodles existentialist philosophy.

event_references.event_default_name: The Life of a Blue Whale

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.7.

navigation.next_event: Between the Slurps of Pork Broth
